verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> be likened <S%G3666><s%> to ten <S%G1176><s%> virgins, <S%G3933><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their lamps, <S%G2985><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> to meet <S%G529><s%> the bridegroom. <S%G3566><s%>
And five <S%G4002><s%> of them were wise, <S%G5429><s%> and five <S%G4002><s%> were foolish. <S%G3474><s%>
They that were foolish <S%G3474><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their lamps, <S%G2985><s%> and took <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> with them:
But the wise <S%G5429><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> in their vessels <S%G30><s%> with their lamps. <S%G2985><s%>
While the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> tarried, <S%G5549><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> slumbered <S%G3573><s%> and slept. <S%G2518><s%>

And at midnight <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3571><s%> there was a cry <S%G2906><s%> made, <S%G1096><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> comes; <S%G2064><s%> go <S%G1831><s%> you out to meet <S%G529><s%> him.
Then <S%G5119><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%> arose, <S%G1453><s%> and trimmed <S%G2885><s%> their lamps. <S%G2985><s%>
And the foolish <S%G3474><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the wise, <S%G5429><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> us of your <S%G5216><s%> oil; <S%G1637><s%> for our lamps <S%G2985><s%> are gone <S%G4570><s%> out.

But the wise <S%G5429><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Not so; <S%G3779><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> there be not enough <S%G714><s%> for us and you: but go <S%G4198><s%> you rather <S%G3123><s%> to them that sell, <S%G4453><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> for yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

And while they went <S%G565><s%> to buy, <S%G59><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> came; <S%G2064><s%> and they that were ready <S%G2092><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> in with him to the marriage: <S%G1062><s%> and the door <S%G2374><s%> was shut. <S%G2808><s%>
Afterward <S%G5305><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G3062><s%> virgins, <S%G3933><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> to us.
But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I know <S%G1492><s%> you not.

Watch <S%G1127><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> for you know <S%G1492><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> comes. <S%G2064><s%>

For the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is as a man <S%G444><s%> traveling <S%G589><s%> into a far country, <S%G589><s%> who called <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> and delivered <S%G3860><s%> to them his goods. <S%G5224><s%>

And to one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents, <S%G5007><s%> to another <S%G3739><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> and to another <S%G3739><s%> one; <S%G1520><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> man according <S%G2596><s%> to his several <S%G2398><s%> ability; <S%G1411><s%> and straightway <S%G2112><s%> took <S%G589><s%> his journey. <S%G589><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he that had received <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and traded <S%G2038><s%> with the same, <S%G846><s%> and made <S%G4160><s%> them other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>
And likewise <S%G5615><s%> he that had received two, <S%G1417><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> gained <S%G2770><s%> other <S%G243><s%> two. <S%G1417><s%>
But he that had received <S%G2983><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> went <S%G565><s%> and dig <S%G3736><s%> in the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and hid <S%G613><s%> his lord's <S%G2962><s%> money. <S%G694><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> and reckons <S%G4868><s%> <S%G3056><s%> with them.

And so <S%G2532><s%> he that had received <S%G2983><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and brought <S%G4374><s%> other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents, <S%G5007><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you delivered <S%G3860><s%> to me five <S%G4002><s%> talents: <S%G5007><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> I have gained <S%G2770><s%> beside <S%G1909><s%> them five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> more. <S%G243><s%>

His lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, Well <S%G2095><s%> done, you good <S%G18><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant: <S%G1401><s%> you have been <S%G2258><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> things, I will make <S%G2525><s%> you ruler <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things: enter <S%G1525><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> the joy <S%G5479><s%> of your lord. <S%G2962><s%>

He also <S%G2532><s%> that had received <S%G2983><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you delivered <S%G3860><s%> to me two <S%G1417><s%> talents: <S%G5007><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> I have gained <S%G2770><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> beside <S%G1909><s%> them.

His lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, Well <S%G2095><s%> done, good <S%G18><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant; <S%G1401><s%> you have been <S%G2258><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> things, I will make <S%G2525><s%> you ruler <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things: enter <S%G1525><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> the joy <S%G5479><s%> of your lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he which had received <S%G2983><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> talent <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I knew <S%G1097><s%> you that you are <S%G1488><s%> an hard <S%G4642><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> reaping <S%G2325><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> you have not sown, <S%G4687><s%> and gathering <S%G4863><s%> where <S%G3606><s%> you have not strewed: <S%G1287><s%>

And I was afraid, <S%G5399><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> and hid <S%G2928><s%> your talent <S%G5007><s%> in the earth: <S%G1093><s%> see, <S%G2396><s%> there you have <S%G2192><s%> that is yours. <S%G4674><s%>

His lord <S%G2962><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You wicked <S%G4190><s%> and slothful <S%G3636><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> you knew <S%G1492><s%> that I reap <S%G2325><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I sowed <S%G4687><s%> not, and gather <S%G4863><s%> where <S%G3606><s%> I have not strewed: <S%G1287><s%>

You ought <S%G1163><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to have put <S%G906><s%> my money <S%G694><s%> to the exchangers, <S%G5133><s%> and then at my coming <S%G2064><s%> I should have received <S%G2865><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> own with usury. <S%G5110><s%>
Take <S%G142><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the talent <S%G5007><s%> from him, and give <S%G1325><s%> it to him which has <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>

For to every <S%G3956><s%> one that has <S%G2192><s%> shall be given, <S%G1325><s%> and he shall have abundance: <S%G4052><s%> but from him that has <S%G2192><s%> not shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that which he has. <S%G2192><s%>

And cast <S%G1544><s%> you the unprofitable <S%G888><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness: <S%G4655><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in his glory, <S%G1391><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> with him, then <S%G5119><s%> shall he sit <S%G2523><s%> on the throne <S%G2362><s%> of his glory: <S%G1391><s%>

And before <S%G1715><s%> him shall be gathered <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations: <S%G1484><s%> and he shall separate <S%G873><s%> them one <S%G240><s%> from another, <S%G240><s%> as a shepherd <S%G4166><s%> divides <S%G873><s%> his sheep <S%G4263><s%> from the goats: <S%G2056><s%>
And he shall set <S%G2476><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> hand, but the goats <S%G2055><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the left. <S%G2176><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the King <S%G935><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> to them on <S%G1537><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> hand, Come, <S%G1205><s%> you blessed <S%G2127><s%> of my Father, <S%G3962><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for you from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world: <S%G2889><s%>

For I was an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> and you gave <S%G1325><s%> me meat: <S%G5315><s%> I was thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and you gave <S%G4222><s%> me drink: <S%G4222><s%> I was a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and you took <S%G4863><s%> me in:
Naked, <S%G1131><s%> and you clothed <S%G4016><s%> me: I was sick, <S%G770><s%> and you visited <S%G1980><s%> me: I was in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and you came <S%G2064><s%> to me.

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the righteous <S%G1342><s%> answer <S%G611><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4218><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> we you an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> and fed <S%G5142><s%> you? or <S%G2228><s%> thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and gave <S%G4222><s%> you drink? <S%G4222><s%>
When <S%G4218><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> we you a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and took <S%G4863><s%> you in? or <S%G2228><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> and clothed <S%G4016><s%> you?
Or <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G4218><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> we you sick, <S%G772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to you?

And the King <S%G935><s%> shall answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G2046><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Inasmuch <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as you have done <S%G4160><s%> it to one <S%G1520><s%> of the least <S%G1646><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> you have done <S%G4160><s%> it to me.

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall he say <S%G2046><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them on <S%G1537><s%> the left <S%G2176><s%> hand, Depart <S%G4198><s%> from me, you cursed, <S%G2672><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for the devil <S%G1228><s%> and his angels: <S%G32><s%>

For I was an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> and you gave <S%G1325><s%> me no <S%G3756><s%> meat: <S%G5315><s%> I was thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and you gave <S%G4222><s%> me no <S%G3756><s%> drink: <S%G4222><s%>

I was a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and you took <S%G4863><s%> me not in: naked, <S%G1131><s%> and you clothed <S%G4016><s%> me not: sick, <S%G772><s%> and in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and you visited <S%G1980><s%> me not.

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall they also <S%G2532><s%> answer <S%G611><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4218><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> we you an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sick, <S%G772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in prison, <S%G5438><s%> and did not minister <S%G1247><s%> to you?

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall he answer <S%G611><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Inasmuch <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as you did <S%G4160><s%> it not to one <S%G1520><s%> of the least <S%G1646><s%> of these, <S%G5130><s%> you did <S%G4160><s%> it not to me.

And these <S%G3778><s%> shall go <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> punishment: <S%G2851><s%> but the righteous <S%G1342><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> eternal. <S%G166><s%>
